medium: Color screenprint, lithograph, screen pencil, gold radiance powder, and graphite
title: Angel and Boy
marks: Signed, dated, annotated, numbered, chop mark LR: [Nicolas Africano, 1986]; LL: [Working Proof (
description:
Two nude figures; a boy on L and a celestial figure in a halo on R; the boy is crouched over; his body illuminated by a haze of bright color; predominant colors: 
green, white, cream and gold
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
